item.title: Motorcycle Parts - KDZ Motorcycle Sales & Services
item.description: Home > Motorcycle Parts Motorcycle Parts We are a dealer for the following vendors and many more: Drag Specialties Custom Chrome Biker’s Choice V-Twin RC Components (Wheels, Frames, etc.) Performance Machine (Wheels, Controls, etc.) S&S Cycle First Manufacturing (Leather Vest, Jackets, Chaps & more) Hot Leathers Vega Helmets You can view parts through the above links and contact us via phone or email for a price. Contact us about Motorcycle Parts Questions 260.

item.title: Motorcycle Service by KDZ Motorcycle Sales & Service
item.description: Home > Motorcycle Service Motorcycle Service KDZ Motorcycle Service technicians can help with your routine maintenance as well as any repairs, so you can keep your cycle on the road. 260.927.0533 Submit Message Labor Rate $70.00 Per Hour Standard Oil Change $43.00 plus the cost of fluids Full Syn 3 Hole Service $175.00

item.title: Motorcycle Inventory by KDZ Motorcycle & Sales
item.description: Home > Motorcycle Inventory Motorcycle Inventory Browse pre-owned motorcycles we have available for purchase. item.title: Credit Application for KDZ Motorcycle Sales & Service Financing
item.description: Home > Credit Application Credit Application KDZ Motorcycle Sales & Service works with a variety of banking institutions so we can get the best possible rates for our clients. If you’re interested in financing your next motorcycle, the application below is quick and easy to fill out. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us using your preferred means: 260.927.0533 Submit Message Prepare for Credit Application During the credit application process, you'll need to input your contact information, personal information and employment information.
